Features

Everything you need to moderate at scale

Focus on creating content while we handle the noise.

Contextual Understanding

Unlike keyword filters, our AI understands sarcasm, context, and nuanced hate speech.

Privacy First

We don't store your user data. Comment analysis happens in a secure, ephemeral environment.

Customizable Policies

Create and fine-tune moderation rules that align perfectly with your brand guidelines and community standards.

Multi-language Support

ShieldGram speaks 30+ languages fluently, protecting your global community.

Optimized Scan Intervals

Comments are scanned in batches with intervals ranging from 5 minutes down to 30 seconds depending on your plan.

Detailed Analytics

Track the health of your community with insights on sentiment trends and blocked threats.

Simple, transparent pricing

Start with a 1-month free trial. No credit card required.
